name: collaborative-code-coference
description: Setup a collaborative coding session with one click -- audio, video, shared coding

TWILIO_API_KEY.description: Twilio Video API Key SID - generate one here https://www.twilio.com/user/account/video/dev-tools/api-keys

TWILIO_API_SECRET.description: Twilio API authentication secret - get one here https://www.twilio.com/user/account/video/dev-tools/api-keys

TWILIO_CONFIGURATION_SID.description: Twilio configuration RTC Profile ID - generate one here https://www.twilio.com/user/account/video/profiles

PUBLIC_FOLDER.description: Folder from which static assets (e.g. css, js, images) are served (DO NOT EDIT)

ACCESS_TOKEN_TTL.description: Duration of validity of Twilio access token (in seconds) (DO NOT EDIT)
